title: Transport Phenomena
description: An introduction to transport emphasizing applications to materials.  Credit not allowed for MSE 3210.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and MSE 3001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
